Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, TheMadKraken2297 said:
> 
> 
> But we're in the same hill... Er... Bunker.
> 

Opps, uh, erm... You Fool! I was talking about the other hill! It is time to expand the Hill Empire! No hill will remain untouched!
I make my own hill , guarded by 5 Moho-class ISPE planes (part of my series, Operation-Colonize!, coming soon.)

I build a hangar and 500- meter airstrip above the bunker, then buy a Piper Cherokee Warrior III and fit it with several Glock 18's. Ghetto dogfighter acheived!

**Edited <time datetime="2018-04-01T16:50:06Z" title="04/01/2018 04:50  PM" data-short="6 yr">April 1, 2018</time> by TheMadKraken2297**
I sent a tank fleet to expand the Hill Empire

Ocean currents have taken the tank fleet away.

Spoiler

![4701195-empty-barrels-of-waste-dumped-in](https://previews.123rf.com/images/dmark3/dmark30904/dmark3090401920/4701195-empty-barrels-of-waste-dumped-in-the-ocean-.jpg)

I buy some DUKWs and put some bofors gun on them.

A few of them get Abrams turrets.
I send an airship fleet to expand the Hill Empire

chul-sunigath  attacks the fleet.

my hill empire.
I build a Zeppelin.
It's lead. It falls.

> 
> 
> 29 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> It's lead. It falls.
> 

Led\*

Fine then.

I build a Zeppelin out of cloth, a steel frame, and leather hydrogen sacks.

It can carry 12 T-14 Armata tanks, or 6 F/A-18/E Fighter/Attack aircraft in the hold, along with a compliment of 300 crewmembers. It is covered in bofors AA cannons and has several different AA Missile battle. It is my new hill, or if @Roboslacker wants to continue the alliance we both can use it.

(for unknown reason it has multiposted)

> 
> 
> 41 minutes ago, TheMadKraken2297 said:
> 
> 
> Led\*
> 

It's Led because it's Lead.  
[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_band_name_etymologies#L](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_band_name_etymologies#L)

**Edited <time datetime="2018-04-04T15:15:25Z" title="04/04/2018 03:15  PM" data-short="6 yr">April 4, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

(del)  

> 
> 
> 45 minutes ago, TheMadKraken2297 said:
> 
> 
> It is covered in bofors AA cannons and has several different AA Missile battle.
> 

But you have only AAA batteries, so your AA guns are out of energy.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-04-04T15:10:26Z" title="04/04/2018 03:10  PM" data-short="6 yr">April 4, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

I send my new tank fleet to the corner store to pickup triple-A batteries for the Airship. The Hill Empire will prevail! Also, the survivors of my previous tank & airship fleets meet up and colonize a hill got the glorious Hill Empire.
Since [@roboslacker](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/175473-roboslacker/) only got triple-A A's, I take a tank a Rob Walmart and gain 20,000 double-A's.
Wernher von Braun has AAAA rocket. A-4
I build bunkers around the newly colonized hill, cementing the Hill Empire's claim on the hill.

I give Wernher money and freedom and he came back with SSSSS.

My Mün !
I build a private transport airship with Light Amplification by Stimulated Emissions of Radiation beams to shoot stuff down, which operate on star Wars physics.

The Sun temporarily gets brighter.  

The air gets hotter and less dense.  

The airship becomes heavier than air and falls down.
The Hill Empire finished the fortification of New Hill. Cargo planes are sent from Old Hill to Other Hill to begin colonization. The Hill Empire will prevail!

I capture Denali, then turn it into a huge bunker- base with storage for 3 of our huge Zeppelin's, hundreds of tanks, and steam aircraft lauch systems taken from an aircraft carrier. I dig a huge man-made extention to the Pacific ocean, that makes the Denali Site (area 2297) beachfront property from which our hill empire can launch Gerald R Ford class ships and battleships from the naval battles threads.
I don't know what that means, so I join The Hill Empire! Me, [@roboslacker](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/175473-roboslacker/), and the rest of our hills!

Denali is the tallest mountain in North America, in Alaska. I captured a mountain.

Whenever you enter to the three- chair throne room for the hill empire, Grieg's In the Hall of the mountain King starts to play in 3 different octaves, for 3 co- emporers of the Hill Empire.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-04-08T01:37:29Z" title="04/08/2018 01:37  AM" data-short="6 yr">April 8, 2018</time> by TheMadKraken2297**

>
